humanum_full_description_en:
The oracle bone inscriptions in the picture above, according to Xingwu, should be interpreted in black. Tang Lan thinks that the character is like a person (big) standing in front of him receiving ink punishment. Ink punishment refers to the punishment of tattooing and painting ink on a person's face. " Black " was later specifically used to express the extended meaning of " black " in black and white, and the original meaning of ink punishment was specifically expressed with " ink ". See " ink ". "White Tiger Pass. "Five Punishments": "The sinner, his forehead also." The early inscriptions on the oracle bone inscriptions, also from " big " from â—. Later, the middle and vertical sides of the first part of the glyph and the outside of the " large " shape at the lower part were decorated with dots and strokes. Later, the " big " in the lower part of the word " black " was corrupted into " flam ". The small seals listed in "Shuowen" used this as a basis. Therefore, "Suowen" believed: "Black is the color smoked by fire. ğ¡†§. ğ¡†§, ancient çª» character. All black is from black." Since Xiao Zhuan has changed from " ğ¡†§ " from " yan ", Xu Shen mistakenly thought that the word would be smoked by the chimney and the fire would turn black.

Oracle " Black " and The shape is similar, and the different characters have the same form. The two characters can only be distinguished based on the context of the rhetoric. " Black " from Mexican criminal tattooed inking extended for black and white " black ", so Oracle used to represent black, such as "collection" 29544: "Collection" 29508 "Black Dog.": "Black sheep." "Collection" 30022: "ğ ¦ªRain å€ black sheep" refers to praying for rain, using black sheep to worship gods. Bronze " black " characters are used for place names and personal names.

" Black " extends from black to describe dimly lit conditions, "Han Shu. "The Five Elements" quotes the Beijing room "Yi Zhuan": "It's dark in the next day. The wind is up, the sky is cloudless, and the sun is dark." The other is " black " and " white ", which are used to express right and wrong. dew. The right to reserve": "Black and white are clear, and the people know what they want."

" Black " can be pretended to be " silence ". The ancient old book "Zheng" before the second volume of Mawangdui's "Laozi": "Speaking Yang and Hei (silent) Yin", the context is relatively speaking, which means speaking is Yang, silence Belong to yin.

Also known as "Black 1".
(1) Black; the color like coal or ink.
(2) Dim; dark.
(3) Night.
(4) Bad; vicious.
(5) Unlucky.
(6) The face is gloomy and stern.
(7) Framing.
(8) Secret; illegal. See "black talk", "black market".
(9) It symbolizes reaction.
(10) Black millet.
(11) Black pigs and sheep.
(12) Refers to the water of the five elements. The theory of the five elements thinks that the color of the water is black, so it is called.
(13) Last name. After the Spring and Autumn Song Weizi, there is the Hei family, and there is Heiyunhe.
